problem_text_cn: 如图,在Rt△ABC中,∠BAC=90°.将Rt△ABC绕点C按逆时针方向旋转48°得到Rt△A′B′C,点A在边B′C上,则∠B′的大小为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, ∠BAC = N_0. Rotate Rt△ABC around point C by N_1 anticlockwise to get Rt△A′B′C. Point A is on B′C, then ∠B′ Size is ()
raw_answer: 试题分析:∵在Rt△ABC中,∠BAC=90°,将Rt△ABC绕点C按逆时针方向旋转48°得到Rt△A'B'C',∴∠A=∠BAC=90°,∠ACA'=48°,∴∠B'=90°-∠ACA=42°.故选A.
